channel.title: GD Help
channel.description:
Ok so i'm in the process of making a halo 3 stat grabber.
[url=http://infernofx.org/php/dynamic/image.php?username=dainfernoman]http://infernofx.org/....[/url] [url=http://infernofx.org/php/dynamic/image.php?username=dain]http://infernofx.org/....[/url]
And if the username is smaller it make the text go to the left.. Is there a way to make it so the text stays there?

item.title: GD Help
item.dc:creator: @usernamelol .Fusion
item.description:
@usernamelol wrote:

[quote=“kloplop321, post:3, topic:165988”]If you would like I could give you the code to make a “glow” (not cpu as intense as checking every pixel)
only to make it easier to read.

also you got the printed out integer of Custom Games crossing over another integer, take like -4 from that y value[/quote]
Yeah im not done aligning those yet.

[php]

<?php header("Content-type: image/png"); $string = $_GET['username']; $string2 = "0"; $string3 = "0"; $string4 = "0"; $string5 = "0"; $string6 = "35"; $string7 = "0"; $string8 = "9/24/2007"; $string9 = "12/16/2007"; $im = imagecreatefrompng("bg.png"); $color = imagecolorallocate($im, 0, 0, 0); $colordate = imagecolorallocate($im, 255, 250, 250); $px = (imagesx($im) - -8.5 * strlen($string)) / 2; $px2 = (imagesx($im) - -20.0 * strlen($string)) / 2; $px3 = (imagesx($im) - -11.0 * strlen($string)) / 2; imagestring($im, 10, $px, 10, $string, $color); //username imagestring($im, 3, $px2, 55, $string2, $color); //totalgames imagestring($im, 3, $px2, 65, $string3, $color); imagestring($im, 3, $px2, 85, $string4, $color); imagestring($im, 3, $px2, 90, $string5, $color); imagestring($im, 3, $px2, 100, $string6, $color); imagestring($im, 3, $px2, 110, $string7, $color); imagestring($im, 3, $px3, 140, $string8, $colordate); imagestring($im, 3, $px3, 150, $string9, $colordate); imagepng($im); imagedestroy($im); ?>

[/php]

Read full topic

item.title: GD Help
item.dc:creator: @kloplop321 kloplop321
item.description:
@kloplop321 wrote:

If you would like I could give you the code to make a “glow” (not cpu as intense as checking every pixel)
only to make it easier to read.

also you got the printed out integer of Custom Games crossing over another integer, take like -4 from that y value

Read full topic
